item.title: Road marking incorrectly reinstated, 31st October
item.description:
The new road marking at the end of Westmorland road are incorrect. The left lane has been painted for left turn only when it should be left or right turn. The traffic sign before the lane is correct but to road marking are incorrect and potentially dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Church hill N213LL never cleaned, 31st October
item.description:
The deliberate non clean of church hill by Enfield council highlights concerning behaviour by those governing the borough, including council scrutiny staff. Church Hill was never cleaned at all, which was exposed, and the council response has consequently been to only clean the bin area outside Grovelands park ( days after it overflows) and fill green bags with leaves - yet leave the entire stretch of road filthy. When I took video evidence of the dangerous bag of gas canisters left on the street for days as evidence of non cleaning, they removed just the canisters and left all of the filth along the road. Myself and other residents are supporting the church by cleaning outside it because, despite drawing the disrespectful approach to street cleaning by a place of religious worship, the council refuse to clean Church Hill .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Church Hill, Palmers Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Archway Road - corner of Jacksons Lane & Highgate Avenue - TfL Street Light Broken, 30th October
item.description:
This TfL streetlight is not working yet again. I doubt it was repaired earlier in the year. It is a TfL style pole and light on a Red Route. It is not in a Haringey side road. Reported in Oct 2024 FixMyStreet ref: 6624613. Also reported in March 2023 and Jan 2022. Previous experience of TfL on FmS is that they close items without fixing them. Prove me wrong and do something that permanently solves the problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Archway Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finsbury Gate, Stroud Green, London
